name: MesoSilica™
description: Colloidal Silica - MesoSilica™ is a true silica colloid consisting of nanoparticles of silica. Silica is an essential element in the body and plays a critical role in bone formation and collagen synthesis, supports healthy skin, cartilage, and tendon regeneration. Silica rejuvenates collagen and elastin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Concentration: 600 ppm silica particles. Mesosilica is a true colloidal silica mineral supplement and has the highest particle surface area for maximum effectiveness.
